title: Miscut - Boss Schmidt T206 Full Name on top - **SOLD**
author: ATP

posts.post_title: Miscut - Boss Schmidt T206 Full Name on top - **SOLD**
posts.post_content: Looking to trade this miscut Boss Schmidt T206 Sweet Caporal back for a few low grade T206 cards that I could use for my set.  It's not in the best shape but it has a full name and the start of the portrait on top from the miscut, fairly drastic.  If you collect these (I personally don't, it just came along in a group I purchased) and have some commons you would like to trade for it, shoot me a message.  Thanks.

PM sent
Email Sent:)

Thanks

Johnny

Just want to let everyone who PM'ed about this know that I am going down the list and replying to those interested with trade (and some) cash offers from folks.  I have over a dozen PM's overnight with more interest that I had originally expected, so if you wrote me a PM I will try to get back to you soon with cards that I would trade for it.
Best,
Jeff
Sorry boys...I PM'ed him right after he posted it last night ;)
Card is sold (to the first person who PM'ed last night about it)
